le/cw ta\ pa/nta nhtrekw=s, a(/ m' i(storei=s,
a)rxh=s a)p' a)/kras: h)\n de\ mhkunqh=| lo/gos,
su/ggnwqi de/spot': ou) ga\r h(/suxos ko/rh
e)/luse xrhsmw=n, w(s pri/n, ai)o/lon sto/ma,
a)ll' a)/speton xe/asa pammigh= boh\n
dafnhfa/gwn foi/bazen e)k laimw=n o)/pa,
*sfiggo\s kelainh=s gh=run e)kmimoume/nh.
tw=n a(/ssa qumw=| kai\ dia\ mnh/mhs e)/xw,
klu/ois a)/n, w)=nac, ka)napempa/zwn freni\
puknh=| dioi/xnei dusfa/tous ai)nigma/twn
oi)/mas tuli/sswn, h(=|per eu)maqh\s tri/bos
o)rqh=| keleu/qw| ta)n sko/tw| podhgetei=.
e)gw\ d' a)/kran balbi=da mhri/nqou sxa/sas,
a)/neimi locw=n ei)s dieco/dous e)pw=n,
prw/thn a)ra/cas nu/ssan w(s pthno\s dromeu/s.

*)hw\s me\n ai)pu\n a)/rti *fhgi/ou pa/gon
kraipnoi=s u(perpota=to *phga/sou pteroi=s,
*tiqwno\n e)n koi/taisi th=s *ke/rnhs pe/las
lipou=sa, to\n so\n a)mfimh/trion ka/sin.
oi( d' ou)=sa grw/nhs eu)ga/lhna xerma/dos
nau=tai li/azon ka)po\ gh=s e)sxa/zosan
u(/splhggas. ai( de\ parqenokto/non *qe/tin
i)oulo/pezoi qei=non eu)w=pes spa/qais
pelargoxrw=tes, ai( *falakrai=ai ko/rai,
u(pe\r *kaludnw=n leuka\ fai/nousai pti/la,
a)/flasta, kai\ fw/sswnas w)rguiwme/nous
a)parkti/ais prhsth=ros ai)/qwnos pnoai=s.
h( d' e)/nqeon sxa/sasa bakxei=on sto/ma,
a)/ths a)p' a)/krwn bouplanokti/stwn lo/fwn,
toiw=nd' a)p' a)rxh=s h)=rx' *)aleca/ndra lo/gwn:

ai)ai=, ta/laina qhlamw/n, kekaume/nh
kai\ pro/sqe me\n peu/kaisin ou)lamhfo/rois
triespe/rou le/ontos, o(/n pote gna/qois
*tri/twnos h)ma/laye ka/rxaros ku/wn:
e)/mpnous de\ daitro\s h(pa/twn floidou/menos
tinqw=| le/bhtos a)flo/gois e)p' e)sxa/rais
smh/riggas e)sta/lace kwdei/as pe/dw|,
o( teknorai/sths, lumew\n e)mh=s pa/tras,
o( deute/ran tekou=san a)/trwton barei=
tu/yas a)tra/ktw| ste/rnon, e)/n t' au)lw=| me/sw|
patro\s palaistou= xersi\n o)xma/sas de/mas
*kro/nou par' ai)pu\n o)/xqon, e)/nqa ghgenou=s
i(/ppwn tarakth/s e)stin *)isxe/nou ta/fos,
o( th\n qala/sshs *au)soni/tidos muxou\s
stenou\s o)pipeu/ousan a)gri/an ku/na
ktanw\n u(pe\r sph/luggos i)xquwme/nhn,
taurosfa/gon le/ainan, h(\n au)=qis path\r
sa/rkas katai/qwn lofni/sin dwmh/sato,
*le/ptunin ou) tre/mousan, ou)dai/an qeo/n:
e)chna/ricen o(/n pot' a)ci/fw| do/lw|
ne/kus, to\n *(/aidhn deciou/menon pa/lai:
leu/ssw se, tlh=mon, deu/teron puroume/nhn
tai=s t' *ai)akei/ois xersi\ toi=s te *tanta/lou
*le/trinan oi)kourou=si leiya/nois puro\s
paido\s katabrwqe/ntos ai)qa/lw| de/mas,
toi=s *teutarei/ois bouko/lou pterw/masi:
ta\ pa/nta pro\s fw=s h( baru/zhlos da/mar,
stei/lasa kou=ron to\n kath/goron xqono/s,
a)/cei, patro\s momfai=sin h)griwme/nh,
le/ktrwn q' e(/kati tw=n t' e)peisa/ktwn ga/mwn.
au)th\ de\ farmakourgo/s, ou)k i)a/simon
e(/lkos drakou=sa tou= cuneune/tou lugro\n
*gigantorai/stois a)/rdisin tetrwme/nou
pro\s a)nqopli/tou, cuno\n o)gxh/sei mo/ron,
pu/rgwn a)p' a)/krwn pro\s neo/dmhton ne/kun
r(oizhdo\n e)kbra/sasa ku/mbaxon de/mas:
po/qw| de\ tou= qano/ntos h)gkistrwme/nh,
yuxh\n peri\ spai/ronti fush/sei nekrw=|.

ste/nw, ste/nw se dissa\ kai\ tripla=, doro\s
au)=qis pro\s a)lkh\n kai\ diarpaga\s do/mwn
kai\ pu=r e)nauga/zousan ai)stwth/rion.
ste/nw se, pa/tra, kai\ ta/fous *)atlanti/dos
du/ptou ke/lwros, o(/s pot' e)n r(aptw=| ku/tei,
o(poi=a porko\s *)istrieu\s tetraskelh/s,
a)skw=| monh/rhs a)mfelutrw/sas de/mas,
*(reiqumnia/ths ke/pfos w(\s e)nh/cato,
*zh/runqon a)/ntron th=s kunosfagou=s qea=s
lipw\n e)rumno\n kti/sma *kurba/ntwn *sa/on,
o(/t' h)ma/qune pa=san o)mbrh/sas xqo/na
*zhno\s kaxla/zwn nasmo/s: oi( de\ pro\s pe/dw|
pu/rgoi kathrei/ponto, toi\ de\ loisqi/an
nh/xonto moi=ran prou)mma/twn dedorko/tes.
fhgo\n de\ kai\ dru/karpa kai\ gluku\n bo/trun
fa/llai te kai\ delfi=nes ai(/ t' e)p' a)rse/nwn
fe/rbonto fw=kai le/ktra qourw=sai brotw=n.

leu/ssw qe/onta gruno\n e)pterwme/non
trh/rwnos ei)s a(/rpagma *pefnai/as kuno/s,
h(\n to/rgos u(gro/foitos e)kloxeu/etai,
kelufa/nou stro/bilon w)strakwme/nhn.

kai\ dh/ se nau/thn *(axerousi/a tri/bos
kataiba/tis pu/gargon, ou) patro\s ko/prous
stei/bonta r(aktw=n bousta/qmwn, cenw/setai,
w(s pro/sqe, ka/llous to\n quwri/thn triplai=s.
a)ll' o)stri/mwn me\n a)nti\ *gamfhla\s o)/nou
kai\ *la=n pera/seis, a)nti\ d' eu)xi/lou ka/phs
kai\ mhliauqmw=n h)de\ xersai/as pla/ths
tra/mpis s' o)xh/sei kai\ *fere/kleioi po/des
dissa\s sala/mbas ka)pi\ *guqei/ou pla/kas,
e)n ai(=si pro\s ku/noura kampu/lous sxa/sas
peu/khs o)do/ntas, e(/ktoras plhmmuri/dos,
skarqmw=n i)au/seis ei)nafw/sswna sto/lon.

kai\ th\n a)/numfon po/rtin a(rpa/sas lu/kos,
duoi=n peleiai=n w)rfanisme/nhn gonh=s
kai\ deute/ran ei)s a)/rkun o)qnei/wn bro/xwn
lhi=tin e)mptai/sasan i)ceutou= pterw=|,
*qu/saisin a(rmoi= mhla/twn a)pa/rgmata
fle/gousan e)n kro/kaisi kai\ *bu/nh| qea=|,
qre/ceis u(pe\r *ska/ndeian *ai)gi/lou t' a)/kran,
ai)/qwn e)pakth\r kagxalw=n a)greu/mati.

nh/sw| d' e)ni\ dra/kontos e)kxe/as po/qon
*)akth=s, dimo/rfou ghgenou=s skhptouxi/as,
th\n deute/ran e(/wlon ou)k o)/yei *ku/prin,
yuxro\n paragka/lisma ka)c o)neira/twn
kenai=s afa/sswn w)le/naisi de/mnia.
o( ga/r se sulle/ktroio *flegrai/as po/sis
stugno\s *torw/nhs, w(=| ge/lws a)pe/xqetai
kai\ da/kru, nh=is d' e)sti\ kai\ thtw/menos
a)mfoi=n, o( *qrh/|khs e)/k pot' ei)s e)pakti/an
*tri/twnos e)kbolai=sin h)lokisme/nhn
xe/rson pera/sas, ou)xi\ nauba/th| sto/lw|,
a)ll' a)sti/bhton oi)=mon, oi(=a/ tis sifneu/s,
keuqmw=nos e)n sh/raggi tetrh/nas muxou/s,
ne/rqen qala/sshs a)trapou\s dih/nuse,
te/knwn a)lu/cas ta\s cenokto/nous pa/las
kai\ patri\ pe/myas ta\s e)phko/ous lita\s
sth=sai pali/mpoun ei)s pa/tran, o(/qen pla/nhs
*pallhni/an e)ph=lqe ghgenw=n trofo/n—
kei=no/s se, *gouneu\s w(/sper, e)rga/ths di/khs
th=s q' *(hli/ou qugatro\s *)ixnai/as brabeu/s,
e)pesbolh/sas lugra\ nosfiei= ga/mwn,
li/ptonta ka/sshs e)kbalw\n peleia/dos:
o(/s tou\s *lu/kou te kai\ *ximaire/ws ta/fous
xrhsmoi=si kudai/nontas ou)k ai)dou/menos
ou)d' *)anqe/ws e)/rwtas ou)de\ to\n ce/nois
su/ndorpon *ai)gai/wnos a(gni/thn pa/gon
e)/tlhs qew=n a)loito\s e)kbh=nai di/khn,
la/cas tra/pezan ka)nakupw/sas *qe/min,
a)/rktou tiqh/nhs e)kmemagme/nos tro/pous.

toiga\r yala/ceis ei)s keno\n neura=s ktu/pon,
a)/sita ka\dw/rhta formi/zwn me/lh:
klai/wn de\ pa/tran th\n pri\n h=|qalwme/nhn
i(/ch| xeroi=n ei)/dwlon h)gkalisme/nos
th=s pentale/ktrou quia/dos *pleurwni/as.
guiai\ ga\r eu)nasth=ras a)/mnamoi triplai=s
ph/nais kateklw/santo dhnaia=s *(alo/s
numfei=a penta/gambra dai/sasqai ga/mwn.

doiw\ me\n a(rpakth=ras au)ga/sei lu/kous,
pthnou\s trio/rxas ai)etou\s o)fqalmi/as,
to\n d' e)k *plunou= te ka)po\ *karikw=n potw=n
blasto/nta r(i/zhs, h(mikrh=ta ba/rbaron,
*)epeio/n, ou)k *)argei=on a)kraifnh= gonai=s.
ou(= pa/ppon e)n gamfai=sin *)ennai/a pote\
*(/erkunn' *)erinu\s *qouri/a *cifhfo/ros
a)/sarka mistu/lasa tu/mbeusen fa/rw|,
to\n w)leni\thn xo/ndron e)ndatoume/nh.
o(\n dh\ di\s h(bh/santa kai\ baru\n po/qon
fugo/nta *naume/dontos a(rpakth/rion
e)/steil' *)erexqeu\s ei)s *letrinai/ous gu/as
leura\n a)letreu/sonta *mo/lpidos pe/tran,
tou= *zhni\ daitreuqe/ntos *)ombri/w| de/mas,
gambrokto/non r(ai/sonta penqerofqo/rois
boulai=s a)na)gnois, a(\s o( *kadmi/lou go/nos
h)/rtuse. to\n de\ loi=sqon e)kpiw\n sku/fon
ferwnu/mous e)/duye *nhre/ws ta/fous,
panw/leqron khli=da qwu/cas ge/nei,
o( th\n po/dargon *yu/llan h(niostrofw=n
kai\ th\n o(plai=s (/*arpinnan *(arpui/ais i)/shn.

to\n d' au)= te/tarton au)qo/maimon o)/yetai
ki/rkou katarrakth=ros, o(/n te suggo/nwn
ta\ deuterei=a th=s dai+sfa/ltou pa/lhs
labo/nta khru/cousin. e)n de\ demni/ois
to\n e)c o)nei/rwn pe/mpton e)strobhme/non
ei)dwlopla/stw| proskatacanei= r(e/qei,
to\n mello/numfon eu)ne/thn *kutai+kh=s,
th=s ceinoba/kxhs, o(/n pot' *oi)nw/nhs fuga/s,
mu/rmwn to\n e(ca/pezon a)ndrw/sas strato/n,
*pelasgiko\n *tufw=na genna=tai path/r,
a)f' e(pta\ pai/dwn feya/lw| spodoume/nwn
mou=non fle/gousan e)calu/canta spodo/n.

xw) me\n palimpo/reuton i(/cetai tri/bon,
sfh=kas dafoinou\s xhramw=n a)neiru/sas,
o(poi=a kou=ros dw=ma kinh/sas kapnw=|:
oi( d' au)= progennh/teiran ou)lamwnu/mou
bu/ktaisi xerni/yantes w)mhstai\ po/rin,
tou= *skuri/ou dra/kontos e)/ntokon lexw/,
h(\n o( cu/neunos *salmudhsi/as a(lo\s
e)nto\s mateu/wn, *(ella/dos karato/mon,
daro\n falhriw=san oi)kh/sei spi/lon
*keltou= pro\s e)kbolai=si limnai/wn potw=n,
poqw=n da/marta, th/n pot' e)n sfagai=s kema\s
laimo\n proqei=sa fasga/nwn e)\k r(u/setai.
baqu\s d' e)/sw r(hgmi=nos au)dhqh/setai
e)/rhmos e)n kro/kaisi numfi/ou dro/mos,
ste/nontos a)/tas kai\ kenh\n nauklhri/an
kai\ th\n a)/fanton ei)=dos h)lloiwme/nhn
grai=an sfagei/wn h)de\ xerni/bwn pe/las
*(/aidou te pafla/zontos e)k buqw=n flogi\
krath=ros, o(\n me/laina poifu/cei fqitw=n
sa/rkas lebhti/zousa daitalourgi/a|.

xw) me\n path/sei xw=ron ai)a/zwn *sku/qhn,
ei)s pe/nte pou pleiw=nas i(mei/rwn le/xous.
oi( d' a)mfi\ bwmo\n tou= proma/ntios *kro/nou
su\n mhtri\ te/knwn nhpi/wn kreano/mou
o(/rkwn to\ deuterou=xon a)/rsantes zugo\n
sterra\n e)nopli/sousin w)le/nais pla/thn,
swth=ra *ba/kxon tw=n pa/roiqe phma/twn
*sfa/lthn a)neua/zontes, w(=| pot' e)n muxoi=s
*delfini/ou par' a)/ntra *kerdw/|ou qeou=
*tau/rw| krufai/as xe/rnibas kata/rcetai
o( xili/arxos tou= polirrai/stou stratou=.
w(=| quma/twn pro/spaion e)kti/nwn xa/rin
dai/mwn *)eno/rxhs *figaleu\s *fausth/rios
le/onta qoi/nhs, i)/xnos e)mple/cas lu/gois,
sxh/sei, to\ mh\ pro/rrizon ai)stw=sai sta/xun
kei/ront' o)do/nti kai\ lafusti/ais gna/qois.

leu/ssw pa/lai dh\ spei=ran o(lkai/wn kakw=n,
su/rousan a(/lmh| ka)piroizou=san pa/tra|
deina\s a)peila\s kai\ purifle/ktous bla/bas.

*(ws mh/ se *ka/dmos w)/fel' e)n perirru/tw|
*)/issh| futeu=sai dusmenw=n podhge/thn,
te/tarton e)c *)/atlantos a)qli/ou spo/ron,
tw=n au)qomai/mwn sugkataska/pthn *pru/lin,
to/moure pro\s ta\ lw=|sta nhmerte/state:
mh/d' *ai)sakei/wn ou(mo\s w)/felen path\r
xrhsmw=n a)pw=sai nukti/foita dei/mata,
mia=| de\ kru/yai tou\s diplou=s u(pe\r pa/tras
moi/ra|, tefrw/sas gui=a *lhmnai/w| puri/:
ou)k a)\n tosw=nde ku=m' e)pe/klusen kakw=n.

kai\ dh\ *palai/mwn de/rketai brefokto/nos
ze/ousan ai)qui/aisi plektanosto/lois
grai=an cu/neunon *)wge/nou *tithni/da.

kai\ dh\ dipla= su\n patri\ r(ai/etai te/kna,
sterrw=| tupe/nti klei=das eu)a/rxw| mu/lw|,
ta\ pro/sqen au)lhth=ros e)kpefeugo/ta
yudrai=si fh/mais larnakofqo/rous r(ifa/s,
w(=| dh\ piqh/sas stugno\s a)/rtamos te/knwn,
ai)quio/qreptos porke/wn linagre/ths,
krhqmoi=si kai\ r(aiboi=si nhri/tais fi/los,
xhlw=| katedru/face diptu/xous gona/s.
su\n toi=s d' o( tlh/mwn, mhtro\s ou) fra/sas qea=s
mnh/mwn e)fetma/s, a)lla= lhqa/rgw| sfalei/s,
prhnh\s qanei=tai ste/rnon ou)tasqei\s ci/fei.

kai\ dh\ ste/nei *mu/rina kai\ para/ktioi
i(/ppwn frimagmo\n h)|o/nes dedegme/nai,
o(/tan *pelasgo\n a(/lma laiyhrou= podo\s
ei)s qi=n' e)rei/sas loisqi/an ai)/qwn lu/kos
krhnai=on e)c a)/mmoio r(oibdh/sh| ga/nos,
phga\s a)noi/cas ta\s pa/lai kekrumme/nas.

kai\ dh\ katai/qei gai=an o)rxhsth\s *)/arhs,
stro/mbw| to\n ai(mathro\n e)ca/rxwn no/mon.
a(/pasa de\ xqw\n prou)mma/twn dh|oume/nh
kei=tai, pe/frikan d' w(/ste lhi/ou gu/ai
lo/gxais a)posti/lbontes, oi)mwgh\ de/ moi
e)n w)si\ pu/rgwn e)c a)/krwn i)nda/lletai,
pro\s ai)qe/ros kurou=sa nhne/mous e(/dras,
go/w| gunaikw=n kai\ katarragai=s pe/plwn,
a)/llhn e)p' a)/llh| sumfora\n dedegme/nwn.

*)ekei=no/ s', w)= ta/laina kardi/a, kako\n
e)kei=no da/yei phma/twn u(pe/rtaton,
eu)=t' a)\n labra/zwn perkno\s ai)xmhth\s xa/rwn,
pteroi=si xe/rson ai)eto\s diagra/fwn
r(aibw=| tupwth\n to/rman a)gku/lh| ba/sei,
kla/zwn t' a)/mikton sto/mati r(igi/sthn boh/n,
to\n fi/ltato/n sou tw=n a)gasto/rwn tro/fin
*ptw/|ou te patro/s a(rpa/sas meta/rsion,
o)/nuci gamfhlai=si/ q' ai(ma/sswn de/mas,
e)/gxwra ti/fh kai\ pe/don xrai/nh| fo/nw|,
leura=s bow/ths gatomw=n di' au)/lakos.
labw\n de\ tau/rou tou= pefasme/nou da/nos,
skeqrw=| tala/ntw| truta/nhs h)rthme/non,
au)=qis to\n a)nti/poinon e)gxe/as i)/son
*paktw/lion staqmoi=si thlaugh= mu/dron,
krath=ra *ba/kxou du/setai, keklausme/nos
nu/mfaisin ai(\ fi/lanto *bhfu/rou ga/nos
*leibhqri/hn q' u(/perqe *pimplei/as skoph/n,
o( nekrope/rnas, o(\s prodeimai/nwn po/tmon
kai\ qh=lun a)mfi\ sw=ma tlh/setai pe/plon
du=nai, par' i(stoi=s kerki/dos yau/sas kro/twn,
kai\ loi=sqos ei)s gh=n dusmenw=n r(i=yai po/da,
to\ so/n, cu/naime, ka)n u(/pnw| pth/sswn do/ru.

w)= dai=mon, oi(=on ki/on' ai)stw/seis do/mwn,
e)/reisma pa/tras dustuxou=s u(pospa/sas:
ou) mh\n a)natei/ g' ou)d' a)/neu mo/xqwn pikrw=n
pe/nqous q' o( lh|sth\s *dwrieu\s gela=| strato/s,
e)pegkaxa/zwn tou= dedoupo/tos mo/rw|,
a)ll' a)mfi\ pru/mnais th\n panusta/thn dramw\n
peu/kais bi/ou balbi=da sumflexqh/setai,
kalw=n e)p' eu)xai=s plei=sta *fu/cion *di/a
porqoume/noisi kh=ras a)rke/sai pikra/s.
to/t' ou)/te ta/fros, ou)/te naulo/xwn staqmw=n
pro/blhma kai\ stauroi=si korswth\ pte/ruc,
ou) gei=sa xraismh/sousin, ou)d' e)pa/lcies:
a)ll' w(s me/lissai sumpefurme/noi kapnw=|
kai\ lignu/os r(ipai=si kai\ grunw=n bolai=s
a)/flasta kai\ ko/rumba kai\ klh|dw=n qro/nous
puknoi\ kubisthth=res e)c e(dwli/wn
phdw=ntes ai(ma/cousin o)qnei/an ko/nin.

pollou\s d' a)ristei=s prwto/leia/ q' *(ella/dos
ai)xmh=| fe/rontas kai\ sporai=s w)gkwme/nous,
ai( sai\ katacanou=sin o)/brimoi xe/res,
fo/nw| blu/ousai ka)pimaimw=sai ma/xhs.
e)gw\ de\ pe/nqos ou)xi\ mei=on oi)/somai,
ta\s sa\s ste/nousa kai\ di' ai)w=nos tafa/s.
oi)ktro\n ga/r, oi)ktro\n kei=n' e)po/yomai fa/os
kai\ phma/twn u(/yiston, w(=n kra/nths xro/nos,
mh/nhs e(li/sswn ku/klon, au)dhqh/setai.

ai)ai=, stena/zw kai\ so\n eu)/glagon qa/los,
w)= sku/mne, terpno\n a)gka/lisma suggo/nwn,
o(/s t' a)/grion dra/konta purfo/rw| balw\n
i)/uggi to/cwn, to\n tupe/nta d' e)n bro/xois
ma/ryas a)fu/ktois baio\n a)stergh= xro/non,

e)gw\ de\ tlh/mwn h( ga/mous a)rnoume/nh,

*(ella\s stena/cei pa=sa tou\s kenou\s ta/fous,

*)ofe/lta kai\ mu/xoure xoira/dwn *za/rac

kai\ pa/nta *dirfwssoi=o kai\ *diakri/wn
